transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan madam boliye.
Executive: Hello. Ah, Namaskar sir, Jyoti baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. Kaise ho sir?
Customer: Badhiya madam, bataye.
Executive: Ah, sir aapse na ye puchna tha service aapka live ho gaya waise.
Customer: Theek hai?
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Haan ji. Aur aapne sir ek feedback dal diya tha wo activation ka aapne waha pe mail karna tha jo confirmation ka aaya tha na. So alag se uska hamare paas mein mail aaya hua tha sir.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan, to mere ko wahi janna tha sir kuch changes wagera kuch update wagera karana hai aapko sir services wagera mein abhi?
Customer: Haan, wo kya bolte hai site jo layout jo choose karna hai khali usme change hoga baki sab to all okay hai.
Executive: Theek hai, wo team se baat ho gaya tha sir?
Customer: Ji madam ho gayi hai.
Executive: Theek hai, other koi concern to nahi hai sir hamari side se kuch man?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi.
Executive: Theek hai, to abhi close kar de sir?
Customer: Haan kar dijiye.
Executive: Ji. Okay sir, thank you so much sir. Have a good day.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquired if customer needs any changes/updates.

- Customer wants to change site layout only.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed service is live.

- Customer confirmed layout change discussed with team.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- service, activation, feedback, layout
